summary: The customer asked the agent about the features of the Contoso Wireless TV. The agent explained that the TV offers ultra-HD resolution, advanced picture technology, an intuitive interface with voice control capabilities, built-in streaming apps, and smart home capabilities. The agent also mentioned that all of these features are included in the price of the TV and it comes with a two-year warranty and a 30-day money-back guarantee. The customer was satisfied with the agent's answers and decided to make their purchase.
